about_the_game:
The mighty Dahlan Empire is falling, ravaged by a mysterious plague and internal unrest. While surviving powers and invading nations fight among themselves, adventurers and mercenaries venture inside this land full of opportunities.

Create your character and embark on an epic journey, enjoying complete freedom in a true sandbox RPG experience. Everything you do affects the world and its people. All important events are recorded. All characters will interpret what’s happening based on their morality and their faction.

Dustgrave: Prologue will let you experience the first hours of Dustgrave: A Sandbox RPG, which will be released later this year! Start your journey in the Prologue, and then carry on with your save into the final game, where you will be able to join factions and level up without restrictions!

The characters will judge your good and evil deeds based on their personality or faction. You may be a robber, despised by common folk, but selling stolen goods could kick-start your career in the local crime groups!

Factions will fight against each other, pillaging and conquering settlements. Some may become major players in the area. Others may be destroyed forever.

Create and customize your main character in every aspect, and roleplay your alter-ego in any way you want, without any external constraint.

Carve your own path, whether you join the Astralite clergy to fight against the heretics or steal apples from commoners! Many paths are available to you: criminal mastermind, righteous hero, ruthless mercenary, or wise archeologist.

Smash your enemies with a complex yet accessible turn-based combat system! Thanks to a unique combat system you can experiment with Skills and Items combinations. Find overpowered combos and destroy everyone stupid enough to fight you!

Use a stealth system to do anything you want. Steal something? Check! Assassinate someone? Check! Watch people sleep? Check! Pickpocket Marco during a quest and use his keys to rob his house while he's still kidnapped? Quite specific, but still doable!

Enjoy Several hours of playtime and saves compatible with the final release version, so that you won't lose any progress!

content_descriptors.notes: Dustgrave features mature themes revolving around war, social instability, violence, crime, and occultism. All those themes are mostly contained within dialogues, due to the game's graphics.

detailed_description:
The mighty Dahlan Empire is falling, ravaged by a mysterious plague and internal unrest. While surviving powers and invading nations fight among themselves, adventurers and mercenaries venture inside this land full of opportunities.

Create your character and embark on an epic journey, enjoying complete freedom in a true sandbox RPG experience. Everything you do affects the world and its people. All important events are recorded. All characters will interpret what’s happening based on their morality and their faction.

The characters will judge your good and evil deeds based on their personality or faction. You may be a robber, despised by common folk, but selling stolen goods could kick-start your career in the local crime groups!

Factions will fight against each other, pillaging and conquering settlements. Some may become major players in the area. Others may be destroyed forever.

name: Dustgrave: Prologue

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-8550U (4 * 1800) or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 7 2700U (4 * 2200) or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia® GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 / Intel Iris Pro 580 / Intel Iris Plus G7 / AMD Radeon Vega 11
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K (4 * 3500) or equivalent / AMD Ryzen 5 2500U (4 * 2000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4096 VRAM) or equivalent / Radeon RX 560X (4096 VRAM) or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Dustgrave: Prologue will let you experience the first hours of Dustgrave: A Sandbox RPG, which is set to release later this year! Start your journey in the Prologue, change the world with your choices, and then continue playing with your save once the game is released!
